FAQS.TAGLINE: Empowering blockchain innovation through strategic investment and expert guidance
FAQS.TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions

1.TITLE: What investment sectors does Golden Gate Ventures focus on?
1.DESC: We focus primarily on blockchain, cryptocurrency, DeFi, and Web3 projects with strong fundamentals and experienced teams.

2.TITLE: What is your investment strategy?
2.DESC: We take a strategic approach to investing across various stages, from early-seed to Series B, with a focus on Asia-Pacific blockchain innovation.

3.TITLE: How does your OTC trading service work?
3.DESC: Our OTC desk provides high-volume crypto trading with competitive prices, personalized service, and best execution for institutional clients.

4.TITLE: What market making services do you offer?
4.DESC: We provide professional market making services to improve liquidity and price discovery for tokens and exchanges.

5.TITLE: How can startups apply for your incubation program?
5.DESC: Startups can apply through our website's application form. We evaluate projects based on team expertise, market potential, and innovation.

COMPANY_OVERVIEW.TITLE: About Us
COMPANY_OVERVIEW.SUBTITLE: Empowering the Future of Blockchain & Crypto Innovation
COMPANY_OVERVIEW.DESCRIPTION: At Golden Gate Venture, we are committed to accelerating the growth of the next wave of blockchain and cryptocurrency innovation. As a leading venture capital firm in the crypto space, we invest in visionary entrepreneurs, groundbreaking protocols, and disruptive technologies that redefine the future of finance and digital ownership.

TEAM.TITLE: Our Team
TEAM.SUBTITLE: Meet the Visionaries Behind Golden Gate Venture

SERVICES.TITLE: Our Services
SERVICES.SUBTITLE: Fueling the Next Generation of Crypto Innovation

VENTURE_CAPITAL.TITLE: Venture Capital & Token Investments
VENTURE_CAPITAL.DESCRIPTION: We invest in high-potential blockchain startups and digital assets across various stages.

OTC_TRADING.TITLE: OTC Trading & Liquidity Solutions
OTC_TRADING.DESCRIPTION: We provide over-the-counter (OTC) trading services for high-net-worth individuals, funds, and institutional clients.

MARKET_MAKING.TITLE: Market Making & Exchange Partnerships
MARKET_MAKING.DESCRIPTION: We enhance liquidity and price stability for digital assets.

INCUBATION.TITLE: Incubation & Advisory
INCUBATION.DESCRIPTION: We work closely with early-stage blockchain projects to accelerate growth, refine tokenomics, and optimize product-market fit.

PORTFOLIO.TITLE: Portfolio
PORTFOLIO.SUBTITLE: Innovative Blockchain and Cryptocurrency Projects In Our Portfolio

CAREERS.TITLE: Careers With Us
CAREERS.DESCRIPTION: Join us to create impactful solutions for businesses. We are looking for self-motivated, creative and competent members, who can add value and contribute towards maintaining GGV Group's market leadership position.
CAREERS.ENVIRONMENT: Our conducive and open work environment provides you with essential training and development opportunities, enabling you to expand your knowledge horizon and unleash your true potential.
CAREERS.CONTACT: Contact GGV HR at hr@ggv.sg for more information.

PARTNER_PROGRAM.DESCRIPTION: Join our partner network to access exclusive resources, technologies, and market opportunities.
